scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The collection includes correspondence, conference material, educational pamphlets, photographs, and newspaper clippings dating from the mid-1960s to the mid-1970s. The papers document the UFT's organization of librarians, as well as efforts to improve school library standards.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Sylvia Mendlow Papers; WAG 035; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Donated by Sylvia Mendlow in 1982. The accession number associated with this gift is 1950.040.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Sylvia Mendlow was a co-chairman of the United Federation of Teachers (UFT) Library Committee in New York City in the late 1960s.
